oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blue Yodel #9 (Standin' on the Corner)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rodgers, Jimmie (1987-1933); Armstrong, Louis (1901-1971); Armstrong, Lil Hardin (1898-1971)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
Yodels; Country music; Country musicians; African American musicians
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The popular country music singer Jimmie Rodgers (1897-1933) recorded Blue Yodel #9 in July of 1930 accompanied by African American musicians Louis Armstrong (1901-1971) and Memphis-born Lil Hardin Armstrong (1898-1971).
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Center for Popular Music, Middle Tennessee State University
